product_name: Hero CosmeticsMighty Patch for Tired Eyes Patches
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsGive BackHero Cosmetics Mighty Patch for Tired Eyes patches refresh and visibly de-puff tired-looking eyes* so you can start your day on a high note. They’re also contoured to fit your under eyes and won’t slip off skin–wear ‘em for 30+ minutes or until the patch turns clear. *after multiple applications
details: DetailsBenefitsAwakens tired-looking eyes*Visibly de-puffs under eyes*Minimizes the look of eye bags*Smooths the look of under eyes**after multiple applicationsFeaturesContoured to fit under eyesDoesn’t slip off skinFeels cooling on skinDoesn’t leave a sticky residueKey IngredientsTri-Hyaluronic Acid: Delivers a blend of hydrationNiacinamide: Energizes skinPanthenol + Allantoin: Moisturizes and calms under eyesItem 2624660How To UsePrep eye area. Start with clean skin.Place the patches. Remove film and smooth patches under eyes.Watch it work. Leave on for 30+ minutes (or until gel turns clear).Precautions: For external use only. Stop use if signs of irritation occur. Avoid direct contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Acrylates Copolymer, Dipropylene Glycol, Niacinamide, Chondrus Crispus Powder, 1,2-Hexanediol, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Lecithin, Escin, Beta-Sitosterol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Adenosine, Betaine, Allantoin, Cellulose Gum, Panthenol, Xanthan Gum, Cyamopsis, Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Glucomannan, Caprylyl Glycol, Potassium Chloride, Dextrin, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Sodium Phytate, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Butylene Glycol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Ethylhexylglycerin.
how_to_use: Prep eye area. Start with clean skin.Place the patches. Remove film and smooth patches under eyes.Watch it work. Leave on for 30+ minutes (or until gel turns clear).Precautions: For external use only. Stop use if signs of irritation occur. Avoid direct contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.

reviews.headline: Works so well
reviews.comments: Recommend by a sales associate in the store. She said this was the best for baggy under eyes. I did one side to see how well it worked and it made a huge difference.

reviews.headline: Grateful!!
reviews.comments: My eyes look visibly less exhausted after just one use. I've bever had any luck with eye patches! Will definitely continue to use.

reviews.headline: Love these
reviews.comments: These actuwlly work and depuffing snd brightening my under eyes. I suffer from genetic puffy eyes that see good and bad days depending on sleep and allergies etc. these definitely work- just leave them in until they turn clear. Then i do my eye cream and makeup. I'm curious if these can be worn overnight. Please make larger and more affordable packs!

reviews.headline: These work
reviews.comments: These miracle workers take the puff away and gives you the refreshed look that sleep couldn't give you. Highly recommend, well worth the price.

reviews.headline: Burned the skin under my eye
reviews.comments:
I've never tried an under eyepatch before, but pick this up on a recent trip to Ulta.

After using for less than 30 minutes, my skin was burning and the skin under my eyes looks terrible

It's been a couple of hours and they feel sore

I'm guessing I'm allergic to something ?  I don't really have skin sensitivity for products, but this was pretty bad.

reviews.headline: These Work
reviews.comments: I'm 46 and haven't had great sleep my under eyes looking dry and purple.  These pads definitely have helped my fine lines due to no Hydration and puffiness.  My only complaint is that their should be more then 3 packs for the price

reviews.headline: Soothing & calming
reviews.comments: I love that these under eye masks dont claim to cure every concern under the sun. The ingredients are simple and they taregt hydration and calming under the eyes which is exactly what under ege mask should do. If tour looking for long term targeted results use an eye cream. These are great in the morning to cool & refresh and also great at night to calm and redness i have. Love them!

reviews.headline: Won't Buy Agian
reviews.comments: I biught these hoping it would help make my eyes look less tired. I followed the instructions on the box. It gave me a red rash under my eyes and making my eyes themselves super dry. The rash is bright red and burns. Would not recommend thos product to anyone.

reviews.headline: Great Product!
reviews.comments: Loved the feel of these! Great for dry and sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: LOVE THESE!
reviews.comments: I have repurchased these multple times & they are amazing! A little slippery when trying to out them ok but once theyre on, i dont notice them moving. Theyre super hydrating, cooling & when i take them off my under eyes are visibly brighter & less puffy. Would recommend!!

reviews.headline: Very slippery, but do the trick!
reviews.comments: Works well, doesn't always stay put though. A little pricey for three.

reviews.headline: Feels good!
reviews.comments: My eyes feel energized

reviews.headline: LOVE IT but very steep for price
reviews.comments:
These are the ONLY eye patches that don't burn my eyes and actually stay on while doing tasks. I love that they are individually wrapped so I can take them with me for travel. 

However, these are very steep for the cost IMO. And, they are not miracle workers. To see results, you most consistenly use over a long period of time. 

All in all, i love them and will continue to splurge but cost and time needed to work should be considered for you.

reviews.headline: Feels like a mini spa for your eyes
reviews.comments: These eye masks are really soothing and hydrating, and stay in place for the entire 30 minutes, even while I was completing other tasks.

reviews.headline: Don't buy this
reviews.comments: It gave me a red rash across my face that took hours to fade away

reviews.headline: Not sure if I'd buy this product again
reviews.comments: The pack only comes with 3 treatments and I've done 2 and I really haven't noticed a difference yet

reviews.headline: DO NOT BUY THIS PLEASE
reviews.comments: please do not buy this. I used them the morning of a very important day expecting that they would fix my eye bags and no they didn't. instead, after wearing them 30 minutes as instructed I got 2 huge rashes under my eyes and they burn. photos that day were ruined.

reviews.headline: Love these eye patches
reviews.comments: These are probably the best eye patches I have used for puffiness. The only con is that they are very expensive IMO for just a few patches.

reviews.headline: Great option for clean under-eye patches
reviews.comments:
I usually get reactions around my eyes if there are any harsh ingredients in products meant for the under-eye area. I've tried these four times, and so far, so good! I haven't had a single reaction to them. Overall, they are cooling on the under-eyes, especially if you keep them in the fridge. They seem to make my eyes look less tired and more hydrated the next morning!

However, one downside is the packaging. I really wish they took inspiration from other brands and used jar packaging. I think it would be 1) less wasteful with all the packaging and 2) more effective, as I personally think eye patches in good, airtight jars contain more moisture. The current packaging allows some leakage from where the patches lay. Either way, I will still repurchase these often, considering how clean the ingredients are and the fact that I haven't used a different brand that didn't give me a reaction.

reviews.headline: Mixed review
reviews.comments: I tried this product and I loved it. However, my boyfriend had an a bad allergic reaction to it for some reason. I couldn't find anything online about the ingredients or anyone else having a similar experience. So, if you have sensitive skin, be cautious. His skin turned really red around the patch and was burning, took ice and time for it to go away.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I usually get reactions around my eyes if there are any harsh ingredients in products meant for the under-eye area. I've tried these four times, and so far, so good! I haven't had a single reaction to them. Overall, they are cooling on the under-eyes, especially if you keep them in the fridge. They seem to make my eyes look less tired and more hydrated the next morning!

However, one downside is the packaging. I really wish they took inspiration from other brands and used jar packaging. I think it would be 1) less wasteful with all the packaging and 2) more effective, as I personally think eye patches in good, airtight jars contain more moisture. The current packaging allows some leakage from where the patches lay. Either way, I will still repurchase these often, considering how clean the ingredients are and the fact that I haven't used a different brand that didn't give me a reaction.
faceoff_positive.headline: Great option for clean under-eye patches

faceoff_negative.comments:
I've never tried an under eyepatch before, but pick this up on a recent trip to Ulta.

After using for less than 30 minutes, my skin was burning and the skin under my eyes looks terrible

It's been a couple of hours and they feel sore

I'm guessing I'm allergic to something ?  I don't really have skin sensitivity for products, but this was pretty bad.

rollup.name: Mighty Patch for Tired Eyes Patches
